messages.messageBody:
Done :)

-----Original Message-----
From: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
[mailto:unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Joanne
Sent: Thursday, July 13, 2006 5:02 AM
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Unbridled Learning - Unschooling Voices
episode posted

Thanks so much for putting Unschooling Voices into audio form. Can
you add a link to the Unschooling Voices information page in case a
listener wants to participate in the next one?

http://www.foreverparents.com/UnschoolingVoices.html

I'll add the link to the podcast to that page today.

Thanks again!

~ Joanne ~
Mom to Jacqueline (7), Shawna (11) & Cimion (13)
Adopted into our hearts October 30, 2003
http://anunschoolinglife.blogspot.com/
http://foreverparents.com
